column5: Might be heading down there in a month. Anybody know anything about shore or charter fishing down  there ?

Can't help you with the shore fishing but charters are IMHO very expensive. I and three of my buddies did a charter last year, 1/2 day $200.00 ea US (plus tips). We caught three small (under 5 lbs) fish which they then offered to cook up for us for an additional $20.00 US per person.
